POR 2022 #47
Vice Mayor Mallon, Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Azeem, Councillor Carlone, Councillor
Simmons, Councillor McGovern, Councillor Nolan, Councillor Toner, Councillor Zondervan
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED AS AMENDED BY VOICE VOTE

2. City Council support of the MIT Graduate Student Union.
POR 2022 #48
Councillor Azeem, Councillor Zondervan, Vice Mayor Mallon, Councillor McGovern
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED BY VOICE VOTE

3. That City Council remind the residents of Cambridge that regular street cleaning begins again on
April 1, 2022 and that all residents can sign up for automatic alerts and reminders from the City of
Cambridge for the remainder of the year.
POR 2022 #49
Councillor Toner
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED BY VOICE VOTE

4. City Council support urging the Massachusetts Legislature and the residents of Cambridge to oppose
House Bill 1234 and the proposed 2022 state ballot initiative and ensuring that the rights of workers
remain solid and strong for generations to come.
POR 2022 #50
Councillor McGovern, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Zondervan, Councillor Azeem, Vice
Mayor Mallon, Councillor Carlone, Councillor Nolan, Councillor Toner, Mayor Siddiqui
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED BY VOICE VOTE

5. That the City Council go on record declaring April 2022, as “Autism Awareness Month” in the City
of Cambridge.
POR 2022 #51
Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor McGovern, Councillor Zondervan, Councillor Simmons
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED AS AMENDED BY VOICE VOTE
